description.title: Hello, I'm Max!
description.message: I do iOS development for work and for fun.

applications.title: Mapstr
applications.subtitle: Save & share your best places
applications.comment: When I joined Mapstr in 2016, we were 2 developers. I left the company 2 years later as CTO managing a team of 6 developers.

applications.title: Discogs
applications.subtitle: Catalog, Collect & Shop Music
applications.comment: I’m currently Lead Engineer Mobile at Discogs. Discogs is the world's foremost Database, Marketplace, and Community for music.

applications.title: MiKee
applications.subtitle: Password Safe
applications.comment: I’m the author of MiKee, an open-source password manager compatible with KeePass.
